file_content.text: Stop right there. Sorry, my lord, but you're not allowed in here.
You will let me in. I'm welcome here.
We will let you in. You're welcome here.
Thanaton keeps his most useful holocrons on the far wall. I'm sure he wouldn't mind if you took one.
I just exploded and rendered your master unconscious. You don't want to test my patience.
Do you really want a fight?
Darth Thanaton asked me to fetch some light reading for him.
Thanaton wants you dead. Everyone knows it. You can't pull anything over on us.
I just exploded and nearly killed your master. Do you want to take that chance?
Uh, um, yes my lord. Right. Just don't mess anything up. And don't tell Thanaton we let you in. He'll have our heads.
You can't blame me for trying.
Whatever Thanaton's paying you, I'll double it. He never needs to know.
Don't insult us. Our loyalty is not for sale. Draw your lightsaber.
